Chaotic Aura

Anytime you use magic, magic is targeted at you, or used near you roll on the chaos table. When you use magic or know/see someone near you using magic you may apply effort to prevent the aura from triggering If effort is applied, it is a L1 intellect task to prevent the trigger.

Roll Choas
1 1d6 of elemental (1d4: 1-fire, 2-earth, 3-air, 4-water) damage
to anyone in a short distance
2 all actions are hindered for one minute
3 Random Fire Ignites Nearby
4 Objects Around You Levitate Briefly
5 All Water Within 30ft Turns to Ice
6 A Patch of Wildflowers Bloom Instantly
7 Thunderous Roar Shakes the Ground
8 Creepy Dissonant Whispers emanate from everywhere
9 A Small Earthquake Rumbles Underfoot
10 A Gentle Breeze Fills the Air
11 A Bright Light Bathes the Area in Radiance
12 A Rain of Glitter Descends
13 Nearby Shadows Seem to Dance and Flicker
14 An Unusual Animal Appears and Observes You
15 A Mysterious Mist Envelops the Area
16-18 Nothing Happens
19 Anyone within an short distance makes a free recovery roll
20 All Cyphers in an immediate distance randomly change

Intentional Chaos

Succeed on a level 2 intellect task to intentionally trigger the chaos aura for a random effect. This will use up a random cypher. Apply effort to trigger a specific effect according to the effort table below

d20 Effort Required
1-2 2
3-15 1
19-20 3

Day Walker

This is a specific ability for Vampires, it costs 10XP in order to purchase at Tier 3 or higher. This ability grants the vampire the ability to walk in daylight without any hinderance or damage applied.

Limited Rune Caster

This is a specific ability for Venatori. A Venatori may spend 1 intellect to attempt to activate or deactivate an already crafted rune as a Level 2 task.

Most graduates of a Venatori academy who were raised among the Venatori have the following runes readily available on their bodies as tattoos

  • Personal Veil/Stealth: an asset to staying hidden around mundanes
  • Perception: asset to seeing through to the occult
  • Fearless Heart: grants an asset to initiative
  • Contain Magic: no game mechanic
  • Mind Shield: an asset to intellect defense tasks
    The only other rune known to Venatori is the TARDIS rune.

Rune Caster

This is a specific ability for any Sussuri. A Sussuri may spend 1 intellect to attempt to activate or deactivate an already crafted rune as a Level 2 task.

A Sussuri may draw a known rune with a special magical ink or with raw magic itself (requires Chaos Incarnate) as a successful Level 3 task. This success also immediately activates the runes ability.

Sire a Childe

This is a specific ability for Vampires, it costs 10XP in order to purchase at Tier 3 or higher. This ability grants the vampire the knowledge and the ritual used to embrace another vampire.

  • The ritual requires a blood 'sacrifice' from both vampire and mortal. Each takes 4 Might Damage and moves down the damage track. Both must rest for 24 hours before they can recover as per usual.
  • Upon waking after the 24 hours the childe must feed on fresh human blood within the first hour of their awakening or perish.
  • The childe is linked to their sire forevermore and the sire may call the childe from any distance and the childe must obey. Breaking this bond costs 4XP. Reforging the bond with another vampire also costs 4XP and requires the ritual to be preformed with the childe's new master.
  • Masterless vampires must make a successful intellect defense roll against a Level 5 Intellect Task in order to not lose control of ones self and fall prey to the blood lust inherent in all Vampires.

Take a Greater Chevalier

This is a specific ability for Vampires, it costs 10XP in order to purchase at Tier 3 or higher and the character must already have Take a Lesser Chevalier. This ability grants the vampire the knowledge and the ritual to create a Greater Chevalier.

  • The ritual requires a blood 'sacrifice' from both vampire and mortal. Each takes 4 Intellect Damage and moves down the damage track. Both must rest for 24 hours before they can recover as per usual. (Take a Lesser Chevalier ritual)
  • The ritual also requires the sacrifice of another human soul. The vampire must drain the life of one human in order to complete the ritual and bind their life and the humans together forever. (ie: if one dies they both die)

Take a Lesser Chevalier

This is a specific ability for Vampires, it costs 10XP in order to purchase at Tier 3. This ability grants the vampire the knowledge and the ritual to create a Lesser Chevalier.

  • The ritual requires a blood 'sacrifice' from both vampire and mortal. Each takes 4 Intellect Damage and moves down the damage track. Both must rest for 24 hours before they can recover as per usual.

Chevalier

A Chevalier is a human who has undergone a special ritual with a master vampire and have become a human servant to the vampire.

  • The Vampire gains:
    • Drain Chevalier (Drain Creature modified)
    • Command Chevalier (Command modified)
  • The Vampire and Chevalier share a Mind Link (modified)
  • The Vampire and Chevalier gain a shared Extra Recovery Roll. If one uses it with in a 24 hour period the other may not. A Greater Chevalier and their master vampire are each granted an Extra Recovery Roll instead of a shared one.
  • Greater Chevalier gain:
    • 1 Power Shift of the vampires choosing
